title: Spectre.Console Integration for AnsiConsoleHelper
details:
## Implementation Summary

Successfully refactored the AnsiConsoleHelper class to use Spectre.Console for spinner animations and console output, resulting in these key improvements:

1. **Markup-based console output** - Replaced the custom ANSI color codes with Spectre.Console's Markup system for more readable and maintainable code
2. **Status widget integration** - Implemented the Status widget from Spectre.Console for better spinner animations with proper terminal capability detection
3. **Maintained API compatibility** - Kept the same public interface so that existing code doesn't need to change
4. **Preserved message pause functionality** - Maintained the 5500ms pause on message changes to avoid too-frequent updates
5. **Improved thread safety** - Better thread synchronization with proper cancellation tokens and status context management

## Implementation Details

1. Added the Spectre.Console NuGet package (version 0.50.0)
2. Replaced the custom ANSI color handling with Spectre.Console's Markup
3. Implemented the Status widget for spinner animation
4. Used task cancellation for proper cleanup of resources
5. Maintained the message change delay mechanism

## Usage Example

The existing code using AnsiConsoleHelper doesn't need to change:

```csharp
// Start a spinner
AnsiConsoleHelper.StartSpinner("Processing PDF files...");

// Update spinner message
AnsiConsoleHelper.UpdateSpinnerMessage("Extracting text from PDF...");

// Do some work
// ...

// Stop the spinner when done
AnsiConsoleHelper.StopSpinner();
```

## Benefits

1. **Better cross-platform compatibility** - Spectre.Console handles terminal capabilities automatically
2. **More robust implementation** - Less custom code for cursor manipulation
3. **More visual options** - Access to all of Spectre.Console's spinner styles
4. **Improved error handling** - Better exception handling and resource cleanup
5. **Modern API** - Using a well-maintained library instead of custom ANSI code manipulation
